title: How to use the ‘keyword everywhere’ to get the better keywords for your blog posts - Quora

response.answer_text: Keyword Everywhere provides monthly search volume, cost per click and competition data of keywords on multiple websites. It’s a handy tool. Just go to their website and click to install the “Add on” for CHROME or FIREFOX. Once installed, each time you search a keyword/s, on that page you will see on the right hand side suggested keywords. They may be better keywords but you need to choose the most relevant keywords applicable to your requirement be it content creation or for an Ad.
